com.decoded.zool

Interface ZoolDataFlow

  • All Superinterfaces:
    java.lang.Runnable, org.apache.zookeeper.Watcher, ZoolDataSink, ZoolWatcher
    All Known Implementing Classes:
    ZoolDataFlowImpl

    public interface ZoolDataFlow
extends org.apache.zookeeper.Watcher, java.lang.Runnable, ZoolWatcher
    This object is designed to transport data directly from ZooKeeper signals to your ZoolDataSink instances.

    • Nested Class Summary

      • Nested classes/interfaces inherited from interface org.apache.zookeeper.Watcher

        org.apache.zookeeper.Watcher.Event, org.apache.zookeeper.Watcher.WatcherType

      • drainStop

        void drainStop(ZoolDataSink dataSink)
        Stop the flow of data to the data sink.
        Parameters:
        dataSink - the data sink currently receiving data from this flow.
